content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=107.5, y=-33.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0) 

### Water supply system
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=107.5, y=-33.5)
-  Pipe group (fluid system 120815, fluid water) connecting offshore pump to boiler

### Steam supply system
Consists of following entities
-  Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
-  Pipe group (fluid system 120819, fluid steam) connecting boiler to steam engine

### Electricity distribution system
Consists of following entities
-  Small electric pole (position x=119.5, y=-30.5)
-  Electricity group (id 574866, poles [(x=119.5,y=-30.5)], voltage 0)

### Transport system
Consists of following entities
-  Belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5, direction UP)
-  Belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5, direction UP)


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Make sure to check the entity's inventory before inserting items
-  Ensure that the item to be inserted is available in the agent's inventory

### Errors when using offshore pump
-  Make sure to connect the offshore pump to a pipe group to transport water

### Errors when using boiler
-  Make sure to add fuel to the boiler to generate steam
-  Ensure that the boiler is connected to a pipe group to transport steam

### Errors when using steam engine
-  Make sure to connect the steam engine to a pipe group to receive steam
-  Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a small electric pole to generate electricity


### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
The following variables have been assigned:
- `transport-belt`: int
- `small-electric-pole`: int
- `wood`: int
- `iron-ore`: int
- `copper-ore`: int
- `iron-plate`: int
- `copper-plate`: int
- `copper-cable`: int
- `iron-gear-wheel`: int
